      • chosenWorkerMessageHandler

        public void chosenWorkerMessageHandler​(VirtualView view,
                                       Message message)
        Callback that handles and processes "chosen worker" message type. Next the view must choose the action to perform
        Parameters:
        view - the VirtualView that sended the message
        message - the message containing information about the selected worker

      • chosenActionMessageHandler

        public void chosenActionMessageHandler​(VirtualView view,
                                       Message message)
        Callback that handles and processes "chosen action" message type. Next perform the action and the transition to next state
        Parameters:
        view - the VirtualView that sended the message
        message - the message containing information about the selected worker

      • chosenWorkersInitialPositionsMessageHandler

        public void chosenWorkersInitialPositionsMessageHandler​(VirtualView view,
                                                        Message message)
        Callback that handles the workers initial positions chosen by the player. The first position is for the female worker, the second one is for the male worker. It places the workers on the board. *
        Parameters:
        view - the player that chose the card.
        message - message with code CHOSEN_WORKERS_INITIAL_POSITION containing information about the chose positions.

      • init

        public void init​(boolean gameReady)
        The initialization phase of the match. Each player has to place his workers when each player has placed his workers start with the first game turn
        Parameters:
        gameReady - all player's workers have been placed, the game can start
